phy_col_normal_y: This read-only variable returns the y component of the collision normal corresponding to the phy_collision_y array value. For each contact point there is an associated contact normal (which is usually the same normal for all points of contact in the collision). This contact normal is a unit vector that points from one instance in the collision to another, and can be used, for example, to calculate the correct "push" direction to resolve collisions
NOTE: This variable is only available in the collision event of a physics enabled instance.
Real (single precision floating point value, or <tt>undefined</tt> if the instance is not physics enabled)
